title: This $65 Frying Pan Is the New Star of My Kitchen (I Reach for It Every Day!)
description: It's on sale, too! READ MORE...
author: Sarah M. Vazquez
text: Tools & EquipmentProduct Reviews & RecommendationsWe independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.Credit: enigma_images / Getty ImagesDo you know what the best thing about moving is? It makes you take stock of everything you own. During a recent move, I found myself going through my kitchen and thinking to myself, “Wow, I seriously need to downsize.” In clearing out my many cabinets, I found a bunch of cookware that had either seen much better days or simply wasn’t getting the love it deserved. It was time for a purge. After tossing some and donating others, I came to realize that I had a pretty solid collection of cookware, I was just missing one thing: the perfect nonstick pan. Now, over the years, I’ve tried picks from every nonstick line you could think of (affordable and high-end), with none of them really impressing me. However, recently, I got the opportunity to test out the Zwilling Clad CFX Frying Pan, and I can confidently say that this, dear reader, is the best nonstick pan out there. What Is the Zwilling Clad CFX Frying Pan? The star of Zwiling’s Clad CFX line, this frying pan is everything you could want in a nonstick skillet. Let’s start with the material. So, what’s so special about Zwilling’s Clad CFX cookware? Well, to start off, it offers the same great even-heating that you’d find in uncoated stainless-steel cookware, coupled with the unparalleled quick release of nonstick thanks to the Ceraforce EXTREME ceramic nonstick coating. It’s designed to last 50% longer and be three times more durable than the brand’s previous nonstick!Next, there’s the design of the pan. It comes in a generous 9.5-inch size that’s perfect for everyday cooking and features flared rims for mess-free pouring alongside a comfortable stay-cool handle for easy maneuverability. Then when you factor in the fact that it’s oven safe up to 400 degrees, metal-utensil-safe, dishwasher-safe, compatible with all surfaces (even induction), and comes with a perfect-fit lid, it’s easy to see why it’s a bestseller.    Why I Love the Zwilling Clad CFX Frying PanLet me start off by saying this: The Zwilling Clad CFX Frying Pan is truly the Goldilocks of nonstick pans. It quite literally offers everything I could want (and need) in a pan. When I first got this in, I put it to the test with a full day’s worth of meals that typically require different pieces: sunny-side eggs for breakfast, a Spanish tortilla for lunch, and a beautiful ribeye for dinner. When I say this pan cooked everything to perfection, I mean it. The eggs? Perfect thanks to an assist from the lid. The tortilla? Crisp and not burnt, just the way I like it. And the steak? Seared and basted to perfection. I’ve been so impressed by this pan, espeically how it cooks like stainless steel but cleans like nonstick. In fact, since getting this pan, I’ve yet to cook a meal without it (much to the chagrin of my other cookware) and I don’t see that changing anytime soon.  Ready to add this perfect piece of cookware to your collection? The Zwilling Clad CFX Frying Pan normally comes in at $80, but right now you can get your hands on it for just $64.99 when you shop it during Zwilling’s early Black Friday sale. Trust me when I say that once you’ve cooked with this pan, it’ll be hard to ever cook without it. Now if you excuse me, I’m going to shop the sale, too — I have a few more pieces of Clad CFX I’m itching to add to my collection.Buy: Zwilling Clad CFX Frying Pan, $64.99 (normally $79.99)My Kitchn HelperGet our favorite editor-tested and -approved finds sent twice a week to your inbox.
html:
• Tools & Equipment
  • Product Reviews & Recommendations

We independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

Do you know what the best thing about moving is? It makes you take stock of everything you own. During a recent move, I found myself going through my kitchen and thinking to myself, “Wow, I seriously need to downsize.” In clearing out my many cabinets, I found a bunch of cookware that had either seen much better days or simply wasn’t getting the love it deserved. It was time for a purge. 

After tossing some and donating others, I came to realize that I had a pretty solid collection of cookware, I was just missing one thing: the perfect nonstick pan. Now, over the years, I’ve tried picks from every nonstick line you could think of (affordable and high-end), with none of them really impressing me. However, recently, I got the opportunity to test out the Zwilling Clad CFX Frying Pan, and I can confidently say that this, dear reader, is the best nonstick pan out there. 

What Is the Zwilling Clad CFX Frying Pan? 

The star of Zwiling’s Clad CFX line, this frying pan is everything you could want in a nonstick skillet. Let’s start with the material. So, what’s so special about Zwilling’s Clad CFX cookware? Well, to start off, it offers the same great even-heating that you’d find in uncoated stainless-steel cookware, coupled with the unparalleled quick release of nonstick thanks to the Ceraforce EXTREME ceramic nonstick coating. It’s designed to last 50% longer and be three times more durable than the brand’s previous nonstick!

Next, there’s the design of the pan. It comes in a generous 9.5-inch size that’s perfect for everyday cooking and features flared rims for mess-free pouring alongside a comfortable stay-cool handle for easy maneuverability. Then when you factor in the fact that it’s oven safe up to 400 degrees, metal-utensil-safe, dishwasher-safe, compatible with all surfaces (even induction), and comes with a perfect-fit lid, it’s easy to see why it’s a bestseller.    

Why I Love the Zwilling Clad CFX Frying Pan

Let me start off by saying this: The Zwilling Clad CFX Frying Pan is truly the Goldilocks of nonstick pans. It quite literally offers everything I could want (and need) in a pan. When I first got this in, I put it to the test with a full day’s worth of meals that typically require different pieces: sunny-side eggs for breakfast, a Spanish tortilla for lunch, and a beautiful ribeye for dinner. 

When I say this pan cooked everything to perfection, I mean it. The eggs? Perfect thanks to an assist from the lid. The tortilla? Crisp and not burnt, just the way I like it. And the steak? Seared and basted to perfection. I’ve been so impressed by this pan, espeically how it cooks like stainless steel but cleans like nonstick. In fact, since getting this pan, I’ve yet to cook a meal without it (much to the chagrin of my other cookware) and I don’t see that changing anytime soon.  

Ready to add this perfect piece of cookware to your collection? The Zwilling Clad CFX Frying Pan normally comes in at $80, but right now you can get your hands on it for just $64.99 when you shop it during Zwilling’s early Black Friday sale. Trust me when I say that once you’ve cooked with this pan, it’ll be hard to ever cook without it. Now if you excuse me, I’m going to shop the sale, too — I have a few more pieces of Clad CFX I’m itching to add to my collection.

Buy: Zwilling Clad CFX Frying Pan, $64.99 (normally $79.99)
